name: iPhone 6s
description: Apple’s classic iPhone 6s with a sleek aluminum body, great for calls, social media, and light apps.

name: iPhone X
description: The iPhone X introduced Face ID and an edge-to-edge OLED display, still fast and reliable today.

name: iPhone Xs
description: A powerful iPhone with dual cameras and a stunning OLED screen, perfect for multitasking and photos.

name: iPhone XR
description: The iPhone XR offers a colorful design, Liquid Retina display, and strong battery life at a lower price.

name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
description: Apple’s flagship with triple cameras, 5G support, and ProMotion display for the ultimate experience.

name: Samsung Galaxy S20
description: Samsung’s premium phone with a 120Hz display and impressive camera for smooth performance.

name: Samsung Galaxy Note 10
description: A productivity powerhouse with the S Pen and large AMOLED screen for work and entertainment.

name: Oppo Reno 5
description: A stylish midrange phone with strong cameras and smooth performance for social media and gaming.

name: Vivo V21
description: Slim and modern with excellent selfie capabilities, ideal for video calls and content creation.

name: Huawei P30 Pro
description: Famous for its zoom camera, the Huawei P30 Pro delivers stunning photography in all lighting.

name: MacBook Air 2017
description: Lightweight and reliable, this MacBook Air is perfect for students and everyday productivity.

name: MacBook Pro 2019
description: A professional-grade laptop with a Retina display and fast performance for creative work.

name: Acer Aspire 5
description: Affordable yet capable laptop with solid performance for office tasks and entertainment.

name: Asus ROG Strix
description: A gaming beast with RGB lighting, high refresh display, and dedicated graphics card.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 3
description: A budget-friendly laptop with long battery life, suitable for students and home use.

name: Dell Inspiron 15
description: A reliable 15-inch laptop with solid specs for everyday work and multimedia.

name: Sony PlayStation 4 Slim
description: A compact gaming console with a huge library of titles, perfect for casual and hardcore gamers.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: Sony’s latest console with lightning-fast SSD and stunning graphics for next-gen gaming.

name: Xbox One S
description: Microsoft’s slim console with access to Xbox Game Pass for endless gaming choices.

name: Xbox Series X
description: The most powerful Xbox yet, built for 4K gaming and smooth performance.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: A versatile hybrid console that can switch between handheld and TV play with fun multiplayer games.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: The OLED model features a bigger, brighter screen and improved audio for an enhanced gaming experience.

name: Apple Watch Series 5
description: Stay connected and track fitness with the Apple Watch Series 5, featuring an always-on display.

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: The Apple Watch Series 7 has a larger screen and durable design, perfect for health tracking and daily use.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 3
description: A stylish smartwatch with health monitoring, fitness tracking, and Samsung’s rotating bezel design.

name: JBL Flip 5
description: A portable Bluetooth speaker with punchy bass and waterproof design for music on the go.

name: JBL Charge 4
description: Loud and powerful with long battery life, the JBL Charge 4 can also charge your devices.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Premium noise-canceling headphones with crystal-clear sound and long-lasting comfort.

name: AirPods Pro
description: Apple’s true wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and immersive sound quality.

name: AirPods Max
description: High-end Apple over-ear headphones with spatial audio and stunning design.

name: Canon EOS 90D
description: A DSLR camera with high resolution and fast autofocus, perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Canon EOS M50
description: Compact and easy to use, the EOS M50 is a great starter camera for vloggers and travelers.

name: Nikon D750
description: A full-frame DSLR that delivers excellent image quality and reliable performance for professionals.

name: Nikon Z50
description: Nikon’s mirrorless camera designed for portability with 4K video recording and fast autofocus.

name: GoPro Hero 9
description: Rugged and waterproof, the Hero 9 captures action shots with 5K video and HyperSmooth stabilization.

name: GoPro Hero 10
description: The latest GoPro with improved video quality, faster performance, and advanced stabilization.

name: DJI Mavic Mini
description: A compact drone with excellent flight stability and camera quality, perfect for beginners.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2
description: Powerful yet portable drone with 4K video and advanced flight modes for creative shots.

name: DJI Phantom 4 Pro
description: A professional-grade drone with high-quality imaging and advanced obstacle sensors.

name: Razer Blade 15
description: A premium gaming laptop with slim design, RTX graphics, and powerful specs for heavy gaming.
